meanings.definition: The state or quality of being crusty.
meanings.sent1: The crustinesses of the old bread made it hard to chew.
meanings.sent2: I scraped off the crustinesses from the pan after baking.
meanings.sent3: The cat's crustinesses on its fur made it look like a little warrior.
meanings.sent4: The crustinesses of the relationship were smoothed over with time.
meanings.sent5: The crustinesses of the paint gave the wall a rugged texture.

meanings.definition: The tendency to form a crust.
meanings.sent1: The pie filling had a strong crustinesses that held up well.
meanings.sent2: Over time, the dough's crustinesses became more pronounced.
meanings.sent3: The crustinesses of the soil made it perfect for planting seeds.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness had a crustinesses that was hard to break through.
meanings.sent5: The crustinesses of the snow made it ideal for building a snowman.

meanings.sent1: The pizza's crustinesses added a delicious crunch to each bite.
meanings.sent2: The crustinesses on the window were evidence of a leaky roof.
meanings.sent3: The crustinesses of the ocean waves left a salty residue on the shore.
meanings.sent4: The crustinesses of the rock formation hinted at its ancient origins.
meanings.sent5: The crustinesses of the pie crust made it irresistible to eat.
